name: Lydia's Winter Jam
description:
Well I think this went better than my previous entry but I wasted waaaay too much time again screwing around.

Didn't help that I was busier on Christmas than I expected. Anyway again I learned a lot from this and hopefully my next  Jam entry will be complete.

Was a lot of fun! Let me know what you liked if anything stuck out for you. Looking forward to playing your games. Merry Christmas!
